title: Thanks Riot! You are a joke!
body:
So for the past week literally not a single game has launched properly. Okay.. sure. People are complaining about it, no worries.

But today. I didnt launch and when i tried launching it, It opens up a brand new 'riot client.' Oh, sweet! I never heard about this. Thats cool.

Well i think its a glitch, like i'm not meant to have it. It doesn't work at all and no where else online is talking about it being released yet.  I literally have to re download the whole game because this new client doesn't work. I have to get the old one again.

Awwweeesome. Thanks game. And incase you wanted to know what the shitty client looks like, [here](https://imgur.com/a/8opgl3t)

You can get help for these issues if you [contact player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I can't see a ticket raised by you yet so I suggest giving that a shot.

Don't know if this is related to the above or not, but i got some random updater after opening league just now, that i assume was attempting to install the same League client (look's like a similar style) that randomly happened once and then didn't happen again (i closed it before it installed itself)

Is this something that is meant to be intended to happen?

Yea there's a new login flow that's rolling out to players bit by bit. Completely expected and looks like the window shown in this article: https://dotesports.com/league-of-legends/news/client-updates-for-league-of-legends-are-on-the-way
Corrupted install directory and required a full re-download to work.

Cheers ended up letting it run since the OP kinda made me think it was gonna stuff over my ability to login.

Though seems like an odd first focus when the issue is the Client, not so much the login.
what if the new client's secretly a comb to find all the bots, cheaters, and multi log-ins (fake accounts) D:? I'd love that :l
